title: vanda kAriyam EdayyA
sahitya:
vanda kAriya EdayyA  dEvarIr ingE


anupallavi

  vanda kAriyam Edu vagai mOsamAgippOdu kuntaLavanin mArbum kUDinda jAlam ingE


caraNam    paravasham umakkangE paTTam kATTuvIr ingE vara vara mOham angE mAyam kATTuvIr ingE
sthiramAna suvar angE daNDikkum dEvar ingE guru pUjai unakkangE sariyAo gOpAlan ingE
